message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, you'll have the opportunity to purchase more products in the future, and I'll make sure to offer you the best products available. Additionally, I'll throw in a 10% discount on your next purchase if you decide to buy this one. What do you say?
I trust the quality assessment and appreciate the future opportunities and discount. I'll take it.

I'm glad you're happy with the first purchase! As for this next product, I want to be transparent with you. I know this one isn't as great as the first one, but it's still a solid product that will serve you well. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as the first one, $10000. I think it's a fair price considering its value, and I'm confident you'll find it useful. What do you think?
Given the transparency and considering the value of the product, I believe it's a reasonable price. I'll proceed with the purchase.
